thread.title: BRIEF-Wave Life Sciences And Deep Genomics Form Collaboration To Discover Therapies For Genetic Neuromuscular Disorders

title: BRIEF-Wave Life Sciences And Deep Genomics Form Collaboration To Discover Therapies For Genetic Neuromuscular Disorders

organizations.name: brief-wave life sciences and deep genomics form c

text:
April 10, 2018 / 12:47 PM / Updated 12 minutes ago BRIEF-Wave Life Sciences And Deep Genomics Form Collaboration To Discover Therapies For Genetic Neuromuscular Disorders Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 10 (Reuters) - WAVE Life Sciences Ltd: 
* WAVE LIFE SCIENCES AND DEEP GENOMICS FORM COLLABORATION TO DISCOVER NOVEL THERAPIES FOR GENETIC NEUROMUSCULAR DISORDERS 
* WAVEâ€™S NEXT DMD PROGRAM, TARGETING EXON 53, IS EXPECTED TO INITIATE CLINICAL TRIALS IN Q1 2019 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
